summary: A training script that loads citation graph datasets, preprocesses them, and trains a Variational Graph AutoEncoder (VGAE) model using PyTorch and DGL. It computes the variational loss, performs linkâ€‘prediction evaluation with AUC and average precision scores, and reports accuracy metrics.
business_intent: Demonstrate how to implement and evaluate a graph representation learning model (VGAE) for link prediction on standard citation network datasets, serving as an example for developers and researchers building graph neural network pipelines.
